      change directory
      interface  ICopyTool
      copy a file to a given location
      interface  IDeleteTool
      delete a file
      interface  IEchoTool
      echo writes its arguments separated by blanks and terminated by a newline on the standard output
      interface  ILsTool
      list the contents of a directory

      interface  IPwdTool

    • sg.edu.nus.comp.cs4218.impl.extended1中ITool的使用

      实现ITool的sg.edu.nus.comp.cs4218.impl.extended1中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  GrepTool
      The grep command searches one or more input files for lines containing a match to a specified pattern.
      class  PipingTool
      PipingTool pipes the output of previous command to the next command as input If any of the command encounters error (i.e. exit with non-0 code), stop piping and print generated output up to that point If any of the command string given is not valid, it prints ERROR_MSG_NULL_CMD On interrupt (CTRL-Z), exit with code 0 and print generated output up to that point
      参数类型为ITool的sg.edu.nus.comp.cs4218.impl.extended1中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      java.lang.String PipingTool.pipe(ITool from, ITool to)
      Pipe the stdout of *from* to stdin of *to* Currently the method is not used by system execution, as the other form, pipe(String, ITool), is enough for piping ASSUMPTION: stdin for the from tool is empty
      java.lang.String PipingTool.pipe(java.lang.String stdout, ITool to)
      Pipe the stdout to stdin of *to* stdout becomes the stdin content of to, and the output of to is returned by the method
